pkgmetadata.longdescription: Non-Smooth Regularization for Structural Equation Models // Provides regularized structural equation modeling (regularized SEM) with non-smooth penalty functions (e.g., lasso) building on 'lavaan'. The package is heavily inspired by the ['regsem'](https://github.com/Rjacobucci/regsem) and ['lslx'](https://github.com/psyphh/lslx) packages.
